sqlMap.select: SELECT SCR.SYS_CUSTOMER_ROLE_ID,SCR.SYS_CUSTOMER_ID,SCR.SYS_ROLE_ID,SC.SYS_CUSTOMER_NAME,SR.SYS_ROLE_NAME FROM SYS_CUSTOMER_ROLE SCR, SYS_CUSTOMER SC, SYS_ROLE SR WHERE SCR.SYS_CUSTOMER_ID=SC.SYS_CUSTOMER_ID AND SCR.SYS_ROLE_ID=SR.SYS_ROLE_ID SCR.SYS_CUSTOMER_ID=#sysCustomerId# ORDER BY SYS_CUSTOMER_ROLE_ID limit #pro_mysql#,#page_record#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYS_CUSTOMER_ROLE SCR, SYS_CUSTOMER SC, SYS_ROLE SR WHERE SCR.SYS_CUSTOMER_ID=SC.SYS_CUSTOMER_ID AND SCR.SYS_ROLE_ID=SR.SYS_ROLE_ID SCR.SYS_CUSTOMER_ID=#sysCustomerId#

SELECT SR.SYS_ROLE_ID,SR.SYS_ROLE_NAME FROM SYS_ROLE SR WHERE SR.SYS_ROLE_ID NOT IN (SELECT SCR.SYS_ROLE_ID FROM SYS_CUSTOMER_ROLE SCR WHERE SCR.SYS_CUSTOMER_ID=#sysCustomerId#) AND SR.SYS_STATUS_ID=1
